message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is in your best interest if we want to avoid inflation eating away at our potential gains.
Let's split things a bit more evenly, Alice.  We both lose if this drags on.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. You're losing more than me with every round. Take this deal before it gets even worse for you!
Alice, this is ridiculous. It needs to end.  Let's split it evenly and call it a day.
